archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes an undated invitation to commencement, the cover to a VPI Department of Chemistry lab book, and a 1928 record book for "Supervised Home Practice in Agriculture."

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Joseph Allen Gills Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Joseph Allen Gills Papers, Ms1992-054 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Joseph Allen Gills Papers were donated to Special Collections in 1992.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Joseph Allen Gills Papers commenced and was completed in 1992. Additional description was completed in May 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Gills attended VPI from 1924-1928. He graduated from VPI in 1928 with a degree in Agricultural Education.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes an undated invitation to commencement, the cover to a VPI Department of Chemistry lab book, and a 1928 record book for "Supervised Home Practice in Agriculture." The invitation is not likely from Gills' graduation, as May 31st did not fall on a Wednesday in 1928. The record book has Gills' name and the year on the cover. There are some pencil notations in the front cover and on the back. The only other page with markings in a note on page 21.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.

did.unittitle: Commencement invitation; chemistry lab book cover; agricultural record book, 1828.
